entries.text: Thank you for calling VeloFit customer support. Please wait while I connect you with an agent.
Finally! I've been on hold forever. I need to return something.
Thank you for calling VeloFit, my name is Sarah, how can I help you today?
Yeah, hi Sarah. I need to return this VeloBand Pulse. It's just not what I expected.
Okay, I can certainly help you with that. Do you have your order number or the email address associated with the purchase?
Yeah, it's [customer email address].
Thank you. Let me pull up your order… Okay, I see the VeloBand Pulse here. Can you tell me the date you received it?
Umm, I think it was… the 12th? Yeah, the 12th of October. So it hasn't been that long.

Okay, thank you for that information. Today is the 27th of October. I see here that the VeloBand Pulse was delivered to you on October 12th. Unfortunately, our return window for electronics is 10 days from the delivery date.
What?! Seriously? 10 days? That's ridiculous! I'm just finding the time now to deal with this. I want a refund.

I understand your frustration. I wish I could offer a full refund, but our return policy is firm on the 10-day return window for electronics like the VeloBand Pulse. It's outlined in our terms and conditions online.
So you're telling me I'm stuck with this thing? This is terrible customer service! I want to speak to a manager!

I apologize that the return window has passed. I'm happy to explore if a policy exception can be made for you. One moment… After reviewing your account, while a full refund isn't possible, I can offer you store credit for the amount of the VeloBand Pulse. Would that be acceptable?
Store credit? So I can buy something else from VeloFit?
Yes, exactly. The store credit will be valid for any product available on our website.
Hmm… well, I guess that’s better than nothing. Okay, fine. I'll take the store credit.

Great! I've just processed that for you. You should receive an email within the next few minutes with your store credit code and instructions on how to use it. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?
No, I think that’s it. Thanks for at least doing something about it.
You're welcome! We appreciate your business. Have a great day!
You too. Bye.
